price: Àti pé kò sí kiní kan fún ènìyàn àfi ohun tó ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: وَأَن لَّيۡسَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-an laysa lil'insāni illā mā saʿā
